title: championship riven and boosting
body: anyone have a account that i can use that owns championship riven, im a plat player and will boost you're account up aswell, just wanna try the skin out

replies.body:
Idk why today in 2015 some people still can't figure out the difference between "your" and "you're", I am truly saddened by this, more so than the fact that OP wishes to trade/share an account while boosting the provider up as a compensation.

Dear Lord.

Lmao.

Course.

You wanna "try" it out.
